name: Terra Poker Token
description: Terra Poker is the first and only Texas Hold'em style poker game on the Terra blockchain. As Texas Holdâ€™em has reached global popularity, Terra Poker is set on becoming the on-chain poker destination for players to experience a truly fun and interactive P2E experience. The primary utility token, TPT is used for gameplay (utility) and holds long-term value accrual mechanisms such as DeFi yield returns (LP and governance staking rewards). Key Features of Terra Poker: 1. Fun and Interactive P2E Protocol 2. Decentralized Finance (DeFi) Protocol 3. Reliability and Transparency 4. Security and Encryption
